message: You'll find answers to this and more questions easily and with high quality insights on Quora: http://www.quora.com/Seed-Funding
Please only list early stage start up investors NOT VC or large scale growth investors
+1 for the quora link - and you can't go wrong with AngelList, either.

You should try the Mid-Atlantic Investment Network (www.midatlanticinvestmentnetwork.com/entrepreneur), who have a large database of private investors and business angels looking for early stage projects across the US.

The first step is to register at www.midatlanticinvestmentnetwork.com/entrepreneur/20.  After registering you will be able to submit your proposal, which we will then send out to our network of investors. 

Best wishes,

Mike
I know one it is called  The Funding Pipeline... let me know if you want a contact
